provider.name: openai
provider.note: Uses OpenAI Chat Completions. Set model via --model (default gpt-4o-mini or gpt-4o)

provider.name: anthropic
provider.note: Uses Anthropic Claude style completion endpoint. Replace payload according to provider docs.

provider.name: google_gemini
provider.note: Use Google Generative API key / OAuth. Endpoint and model name configurable.

provider.name: ollama_local
provider.note: Local server (e.g., http://localhost:11434). No remote key required if running locally.

provider.name: offline
provider.note: Offline fallback uses built-in ascii templates (no key required).
